title: Cafe Kokko
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Pizza, Organic, Raw, Juice bar, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Cafe/tea room/juice bar located on the second floor of a two level penthouse cafe in a warehouse by the sea. Serves raw cakes, vegan cakes, juices, smoothies, coffee from a local micro roaster, a selection of teas, and gluten free items. Has a sauna, too. Previously located on Kanavaranta, May 2015.
